description: This file contains implementation of PowerManagement-related functions, including getting and setting a boolean parameter for PCIe power management, along with validation, commit, and rollback handlers. It includes standard licensing headers, necessary includes, and function definitions for manipulating power management settings on specific hardware.

methods.name: PowerManagement_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves the boolean value of the 'PciEPowerManagement' parameter, reading from a sysfs file when on specific hardware.

methods.name: PowerManagement_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets the boolean value of the 'PciEPowerManagement' parameter, modifying system power management policy via system commands.

methods.name: PowerManagement_Validate
methods.description: Performs validation before committing changes; currently always returns true.

methods.name: PowerManagement_Commit
methods.description: Commits power management changes; currently a success placeholder.

methods.name: PowerManagement_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back changes in case of validation failure; currently a success placeholder.
